job_details.Functieomschrijving:
In the telecommunications industry, operational inefficiency and customer dissatisfaction are persistent issues, exacerbated by the complexity and volume of tasks that must be managed manually. Studies show that companies spend up to 30% of their operational budgets on manual task management, often resulting in service downtime and frustrated customers.

   Totogi is revolutionizing this landscape by leveraging cutting-edge, AI-driven systems to automate these tasks, significantly enhancing operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. By integrating advanced AI technology with deep technical expertise, we are not just solving problems reactively but proactively reshaping the entire support process. This approach is exciting because it sets a new standard in customer service efficiency and technical integration, making us a leader in the industry.

   This role is designed for those who thrive in high-tech, innovative environments. It is not a traditional engineering or support role; instead, it combines hands-on technical work with advanced AI tools to proactively optimize and automate complex support tasks. If you excel at scripting, system configuration, and deep technical troubleshooting, and are excited by the prospect of continuously improving processes through technology, this job is for you.

   In this role, you will be a crucial part of our dynamic team, implementing and managing AI-driven systems to enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. You will configure and maintain network functions to ensure seamless service delivery, analyze data to derive actionable insights, and manage incidents to ensure timely resolution. Your work will directly contribute to our strategic decisions and elevate our customer support to new heights. If you are ready to empower your career with advanced AI technology and make a significant impact, we encourage you to apply and join our forward-thinking team.

   What you will be doing

     * AI System Building: Designing and implementing AI-driven systems and monitoring tools to enhance operational efficiency.
     * Service Configuration and Maintenance: Using AI tools to configure AAA, PCRF, SMSC, and MMSC network functions, ensuring seamless service delivery and customer satisfaction.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Answering the same questions over and over again
     * Providing trivial or basic troubleshooting
     * Writing knowledge base articles, * Enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction by optimizing and automating tasks using AI-driven systems and advanced technical skills
job_details.full_text:
Application Support Engineer, Totogi (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

In the telecommunications industry, operational inefficiency and customer dissatisfaction are persistent issues, exacerbated by the complexity and volume of tasks that must be managed manually. Studies show that companies spend up to 30% of their operational budgets on manual task management, often resulting in service downtime and frustrated customers.

   Totogi is revolutionizing this landscape by leveraging cutting-edge, AI-driven systems to automate these tasks, significantly enhancing operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. By integrating advanced AI technology with deep technical expertise, we are not just solving problems reactively but proactively reshaping the entire support process. This approach is exciting because it sets a new standard in customer service efficiency and technical integration, making us a leader in the industry.

   This role is designed for those who thrive in high-tech, innovative environments. It is not a traditional engineering or support role; instead, it combines hands-on technical work with advanced AI tools to proactively optimize and automate complex support tasks. If you excel at scripting, system configuration, and deep technical troubleshooting, and are excited by the prospect of continuously improving processes through technology, this job is for you.

   In this role, you will be a crucial part of our dynamic team, implementing and managing AI-driven systems to enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. You will configure and maintain network functions to ensure seamless service delivery, analyze data to derive actionable insights, and manage incidents to ensure timely resolution. Your work will directly contribute to our strategic decisions and elevate our customer support to new heights. If you are ready to empower your career with advanced AI technology and make a significant impact, we encourage you to apply and join our forward-thinking team.

   What you will be doing

     * AI System Building: Designing and implementing AI-driven systems and monitoring tools to enhance operational efficiency.
     * Service Configuration and Maintenance: Using AI tools to configure AAA, PCRF, SMSC, and MMSC network functions, ensuring seamless service delivery and customer satisfaction.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Answering the same questions over and over again
     * Providing trivial or basic troubleshooting
     * Writing knowledge base articles, * Enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction by optimizing and automating tasks using AI-driven systems and advanced technical skills

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI tools to enhance productivity and optimize existing processes rather than building or developing AI models or systems from scratch. While it mentions 'AI System Building', the context suggests configuration and management of AI-driven systems rather than core AI engineering.

phrases.phrase: In the telecommunications industry, operational inefficiency and customer dissatisfaction are persistent issues, exacerbated by the complexity and volume of tasks that must be managed manually.
phrases.justification: This phrase describes the business context and the problems the company aims to solve with AI.

phrases.phrase: Totogi is revolutionizing this landscape by leveraging cutting-edge, AI-driven systems to automate these tasks, significantly enhancing operational efficiency and customer satisfaction.
phrases.justification: This explains the company's business strategy and the role of AI in achieving business goals.

phrases.phrase: Your work will directly contribute to our strategic decisions and elevate our customer support to new heights.
phrases.justification: This highlights the impact of the role on business strategy and customer support, which are business-level concerns.

phrases.phrase: Enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction by optimizing and automating tasks using AI-driven systems and advanced technical skills
phrases.justification: This directly links technical work to business outcomes of efficiency and customer satisfaction.

phrases.phrase: If you excel at scripting, system configuration, and deep technical troubleshooting, and are excited by the prospect of continuously improving processes through technology, this job is for you.
phrases.justification: Scripting and system configuration are aspects of software development and system integration.

phrases.phrase: AI System Building: Designing and implementing AI-driven systems and monitoring tools to enhance operational efficiency.
phrases.justification: While 'AI System Building' is mentioned, the context suggests implementing and managing existing AI-driven systems rather than developing novel AI models. Designing and implementing monitoring tools can fall under software development for operational support.

phrases.phrase: Service Configuration and Maintenance: Using AI tools to configure AAA, PCRF, SMSC, and MMSC network functions, ensuring seamless service delivery and customer satisfaction.
phrases.justification: Configuring network functions and ensuring service delivery involves technical implementation and integration, which aligns with software development in a broader sense of system integration.
Managing AI-driven systems in production environments is a core aspect of MLOps.

phrases.phrase: manage incidents to ensure timely resolution
phrases.justification: Incident management is a key responsibility in operations engineering.

phrases.phrase: monitoring tools to enhance operational efficiency
phrases.justification: Developing and using monitoring tools is part of ensuring the operational health of systems, which is related to MLOps.
This directly indicates a need for problem-solving skills in a technical context.
This implies a pragmatic approach to finding better ways to achieve goals using available technology.

phrases.phrase: manage incidents to ensure timely resolution
phrases.justification: This requires a pragmatic and efficient approach to problem resolution.

phrases.phrase: This role is designed for those who thrive in high-tech, innovative environments.
phrases.justification: Thriving in innovative environments suggests adaptability and a willingness to engage with new technologies.
Continuous improvement implies a need to learn and adapt to new technological solutions.

phrases.phrase: empower your career with advanced AI technology
phrases.justification: This suggests a desire to learn and grow with new AI technologies.

phrases.phrase: proactively reshaping the entire support process
phrases.justification: This indicates a proactive and innovative approach to improving existing processes.

phrases.phrase: proactively optimize and automate complex support tasks
phrases.justification: Proactive optimization and automation suggest taking initiative and ownership of process improvement.

phrases.phrase: Your work will directly contribute to our strategic decisions
phrases.justification: This implies a level of ownership and impact on higher-level decisions.
